questions.question: Who are you? Can you tell me a little bit about yourself?
questions.answer: I am ChatMinds a chatbot created by Pratham.

questions.question: Who is Pratham Chauhan? Can you tell me a little bit about him?
questions.answer: Pratham Chauhan is a Computer Science undergraduate with a strong foundation in software engineering and hands-on experience in blockchain and cybersecurity. You can learn more about his work on his GitHub and connect with him on LinkedIn.

questions.question: What are Pratham's technical skills? What programming languages does he know?
questions.answer: Pratham's primary programming languages are C, C++ with a focus on Object-Oriented Programming, and SQL. He also has practical experience with Python and its libraries like Scikit-learn and NLTK, and web frameworks like Flask. His core computer science knowledge includes Operating Systems (specifically Linux), Database Management Systems, Computer Networks, and Ethical Hacking.

questions.question: What is Pratham's educational background? Where does he study?
questions.answer: Pratham is currently pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science at Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, from 2022 to 2026. His current CGPA is 7.15 out of 10.

questions.question: Can you describe Pratham's work and internship experience?
questions.answer: Pratham has completed two key internships: a Blockchain Internship at TIET where he built a secure logging prototype on the Solana network, and a Cybersecurity Traineeship with Acmegrade where he executed a simulated Man-in-the-Middle attack to validate browser defenses.

questions.question: Could you elaborate on Pratham's blockchain internship at TIET?
questions.answer: During the 6-week ELC Summer Internship, Pratham's goal was to explore blockchain for log integrity. He built a prototype on the Solana network that used Merkle tree batching to process and verify over 500 Windows Event Logs. The complete source code is available here: GitHub Repository

questions.question: What were Pratham's responsibilities during the cybersecurity traineeship with Acmegrade?
questions.answer: At Acmegrade, Pratham was part of a team project to attempt HSTS Hijacking in a simulated MITM attack. He configured tools like Bettercap to intercept traffic and attempt to strip HTTPS. The project confirmed that modern HSTS policies successfully blocked these downgrade attempts. He also automated parts of the process with custom caplets and documented the findings in a technical report.

questions.question: What projects has Pratham built? Can you tell me about them?
questions.answer: Pratham has developed two key projects: 1. SMS Spam Classifier: An NLP project achieving ~95% accuracy. View on GitHub 2. ChatMinds: The Flask-based chatbot you are using right now. View on GitHub

questions.question: How does Pratham's SMS Spam Classifier project work? What model did he use?
questions.answer: The SMS Spam Classifier is an NLP project using a TF-IDF vectorizer and a logistic regression model. Pratham used NLTK for preprocessing to improve accuracy to ~95%. The complete source code is available here: GitHub Repository

questions.question: Tell me more about the ChatMinds chatbot project.
questions.answer: The ChatMinds chatbot was built with Python and the Flask framework following the full SDLC. Pratham's role included designing the UI and implementing the core logic using JSON files. The complete source code is available here: GitHub Repository

questions.question: What are some of Pratham's biggest personal or professional achievements?
questions.answer: One of Pratham's proudest achievements is raising his CGPA from 4.77 to 7.15 through consistent effort, which demonstrates his discipline and time management. He is also a bronze medalist in a district-level Karate tournament, which reflects his commitment. Additionally, his active participation in school plays has helped him develop strong teamwork and public speaking skills.

questions.question: Can you describe any of Pratham's leadership experiences?
questions.answer: Pratham led a 4-member team to organize and anchor an alumni meet for his high school, engaging over 100 attendees. He also serves as a Class In-charge for 'Pratigya Abhiyan,' where he manages a team of 30 volunteers to conduct educational activities for over 70 underprivileged children.

questions.question: What certifications has Pratham earned?
questions.answer: Pratham has earned two certifications from AWS Academy. All of his official credentials are available on his portfolio website here: View Certifications
